name: The Last Seed Of Hope
description:
How to Survive:

Use your pot, "Kawaii the Evil", to protect the last tree on Earth

Defend yourself using your Ivy Attack
Hold Left Mouse Button (LMB) to recharge your attack

Release LMB to attack
Protect yourself until you manage to create your offspring
Extra:
Change the difficulty be clicking the crescent below the pot
Can you survive global warming mode!
